After seeing the nearby surrounding area and perhaps getting that much deserved rest for a few days, it\'s a good place for planning out your route to see the entire gorgeous state of Chiapas, Must see are the history including quaint old cities and several pyramid ruin areas like Palenque and Bonampak; the friendly cultures of the native and Mexican people; the awesome waterfalls and cascades throughout the region; and the nightly stays in or near the jungle. Whether you travel clockwise or counterclockwise from Tuxtla,  every day is a beautiful and exciting adventure that will leave you wanting to either explore even further, or return another time to see what you may have missed on your trip that you didn\'t allow enough time for.  This area of Mexico offers far more than I could ever have imagined and I highly recommend doing a little homework before you plan your trip to Chiapas and make sure you allow enough time to just explore and enjoy the beauty that this area of Mexico has to offer..  And, then also consider visiting Oaxaca, the next state to the West.  I haven\'t seen it yet, but I\'ve heard it\'s also absolutely awesome.  Enjoy!!

361170003.name: It is a party and everyone is invited!
361170003.author: a TripAdvisor user
361170003.reviewBody:
This place offers a really nice combination of music, people dancing, snacks, and family time.
Starting by 6:30 pm local musicians set up their instruments and start playing covers and proprietary songs in a nice instrumental way.
My kids were amused of all the people dancing around the place.
There are also snacks to try there such as soft corn in a cup, Crepe, Tortas, and so on.

360385222.name: Good evening for music
360385222.author: a TripAdvisor user
360385222.reviewBody: This plaza is the only tourist area we found in the city . We had a good evening of music and food .

358043238.name: Great
358043238.author: a TripAdvisor user
358043238.reviewBody: This place has marimba music every night. Very safe, restaurants all around, families visit and dance to the tunes

355907476.name: Must see in Tuxtla
355907476.author: a TripAdvisor user
355907476.reviewBody: If you are in Tuxtla, you must come down here in the evening at 8 pm to listen to the marimba music and dance if that is your thing. Lots of positive energy here. There are also plenty of benches to sit and watch as well or grab a seat at the cafe in the park for tasty crepes.

355850102.name: Bailamos Let\'s Dance
355850102.author: a TripAdvisor user
355850102.reviewBody: I had heard about the special instrument called the marimba from my boyfriend and his family, but nothing prepared me for hearing it and seeing this park in person. A large gazebo holds multiple marimba musicians as well as others playing their instruments. Old and young danced to the rhythms that were being played as people either lined the parks and watched or got up and danced themselves. I felt like I was being transported into another era. I loved it.

353846539.name: Such a wonderful experience
353846539.author: a TripAdvisor user
353846539.reviewBody: We listened to Marimba music in the park, free, daily at 6:00 p.m., performed by the local police we were told, many local people of all ages watching from the rows of park benches, and dancing. A truly lovely experience, we went the Marimba museum on the corner the next morning, opens at 10 except Monday\'s, and were treated to a marimba concert played by 3 musicians, charming!

351717499.name: Lots of people, music and fun
351717499.author: a TripAdvisor user
351717499.reviewBody: We arrived on Sunday night.  Lots of good music, large crowd, dancing, children, and in general a nice place to sit..or dance.

349407155.name: one of the most beautifull parks in mexico
349407155.author: a TripAdvisor user
349407155.reviewBody: you can enjoy the marima nigths with dancing lessons and excelent music, good restaurants and coffes arround it and the marimba museum wich is the original music instrument from chiapas

348721457.name: Awesome night
348721457.author: a TripAdvisor user
348721457.reviewBody: Everyone so polite...amazing for older couples and families...I Visited Wednesday  Night From 7PM To 9pm . Cheap hotels decent rooms...shops all around this park.\n

340108143.name: Shade and music
340108143.author: a TripAdvisor user
340108143.reviewBody: We visited at around 10 am, and  found a quiet park with people sitting in the shade of the large trees. Reading or chatting. No marimba music in the morning, though we enjoyed watching a group of seniors rehearsing traditional Chiapas dances in the center kiosk! In all a relaxing and pleasant experience, \n

337900192.name: Nice Musical Evening
337900192.author: a TripAdvisor user
337900192.reviewBody: If you like Marimba music and some dancing, this is the place to go. Went there for about an hour and enjoyed the atmosphere very much.

333934141.name: Nothing to see or hear... Next time
333934141.author: a TripAdvisor user
333934141.reviewBody: It is probably a very nice attraction in the city of Tuxtla Guti\u00e9rrez when there is marimba music being played, but nothing was going on when we showed up on a Saturday afternoon. \nToo bad, we\'ll have to come back another time.

330031491.name: Pura vida
330031491.author: a TripAdvisor user
330031491.reviewBody: Great place.  This is what civic spirit is all about.  Keeping up the best of local traditions.  Festive spirit and participaction !  Dance or be a spectator.  This feature of Tuxtla alone and by itself makes the visit worthwhile.  Loved it !\nViva Tuxtla.  Viva Chiapas y Viva La Marimba !

329780426.name: My mom loved the music
329780426.author: a TripAdvisor user
329780426.reviewBody: When you arrive at the plaza and start to listen to the music , it transports you to the 1950\'s and as soon as you see the people dance around the plaza, you feel the passion and commitment they have to continue a great tradition . You should not miss this experience when going to Tuxtla

323430698.name: Fantastic place to visit at night
323430698.author: a TripAdvisor user
323430698.reviewBody:
I went to the park around 8pm excellent live music, cumbia, salsa, danzon...

My 6yo was marveled watching the band and people dancing

We later too a coffee at the cafe Chichon..

I really recommend it, probably live music will be on weekends only I went on a Saturday...

318358161.name: Very nice Parque .
318358161.author: a TripAdvisor user
318358161.reviewBody: Very nice Parque with great food all around the park. There are crepe, hamburger, cool ice with cream, tacos and more.

311140020.name: Something to do
311140020.author: a TripAdvisor user
311140020.reviewBody: Cute little park that had live music on a week night. Fair prices for souveneirs and a fun atmosphere. A good place to go walk around or sit at for a while!

293732712.name: Fun atmosphere however be aware of the rip off food stalls
293732712.author: a TripAdvisor user
293732712.reviewBody:
Each evening between ~6pm and 9pm this parque transforms with marimba music, dancing and market stalls. We enjoyed the atmosphere so much that we visited each night of our three night stay in Tuxtla. It was great fun to just soak up the music while people watching and browsing all the tempting sweet and savory food options and craft vendors.

However DON'T be tempted to eat at the Oaxacan tlayuda stalls on the east side of the parque. The cost of the food is verging on theft and we wish we had enquired about the price before eating. 135 peso for one huarache is extortion and incase you are wondering, no it wasn't as good as others I've eaten for less than half that price. 

We still highly recommend visiting the parque but just tread with caution when it comes to prices of food there.

289945735.name: Marimba
289945735.author: a TripAdvisor user
289945735.reviewBody: It is a really beautiful park, they play local music from 6 to 9 pm. The locals sell artesan\u00edas, local clothes, etc.  Worth a visit

268553325.name: the best place in Tuxtla Gutierrez
268553325.author: a TripAdvisor user
268553325.reviewBody: Is the first stop in tuxtla, tipical music, funny moments, best experience about chiapas and Marimba.

267908918.name: Lovely Atmosphere
267908918.author: a TripAdvisor user
267908918.reviewBody: In a city that seems to be otherwise lacking in charm, this was a nice levent. We were there on on a Friday night, and the plaza was full of families and people of all ages enjoying the live music. If you\'re passing through Tuxtla, this definitely warrants a visit (from 6-9pm) if you like music, people watching, or shaking your booty.

267198526.name: Marimba Every Night
267198526.author: a TripAdvisor user
267198526.reviewBody: In the Plaza de las Marimbas their is a bandstand that every night hosts marimba bands that play for a couple of hours. The music is loud and causes dancers of every age to move to the beat. Even if you don\'t dance, you can maybe find a seat nearby to watch and listen, or there are a few coffee, ice cream and marquesitas (crepes) places across the street to the east f the plaza. Also, across the street to the west there is a museum of marimbas. We went one morning and were incited into a performance room while a group played several songs for us and invited us to try to play the marimbas. Great fun.

265479746.name: Nice Music
265479746.author: a TripAdvisor user
265479746.reviewBody: This a whole new atmosphere and brings back a serenity to a hppy place. Good times to enjoy a great family outing and learning new culture. We loved it and will return!

258970901.name: Romantically aluring
258970901.author: a TripAdvisor user
258970901.reviewBody: Loved the ambiance of "small town Mexico at it\'s  best"! Tuxtla Gutierrez is anything but a small town! But in the evening I could not help myself mentally fleeing from the hustle and bustle of the cities traffic and commerce. I swayed at the melancholy sound of the marimba and the couples, elegantly, dancing to it\'s rhythm. Such a treat!!!! My only disappointment is that none in my group would dance with me when the genre switched to "Tropical" music!!!!

248708529.name: Lively park every evening
248708529.author: a TripAdvisor user
248708529.reviewBody: Looks like the local families together with visitors from out of town gather here to spend the evening while listening to music or watching street performers. One can see many children playing.\nThere are plenty of vendors selling esquite and corn in the cob.

245725202.name: Music and dancing with a marimba
245725202.author: a TripAdvisor user
245725202.reviewBody: There are many little coffee shoppes and places to sit down to have crepes. At marimba park something spectacular happens at night. People show up every night to listen to the marimba play and dance in the main square. It\'s super fu. If you like to dance or people watch; there is an endless supply of entertainment. After the marimba leaves locals and peddlers set up their items to sell. One night there was a bongo player and his group later at night. The guy has rhythm.  The fact that people still go to dance and meet at marimba park makes it a must see.

239179217.name: A must visit!
239179217.author: a TripAdvisor user
239179217.reviewBody:
Most of the pictures in this attraction DO NOT belong to the actual park, they just confuse people...

This is a small one block park in the middle of Tuxtla, very unassuming during the day, but at 6pm it all changes... the marimba band comes out and starts playing until 9 pm every day! locals gather to listen and yes, they dance...you can also dance (awkward!!) and have some late mexican snacks like churros or corn or cotton candy... or... have a real bite to eat at any of the dozen restaurants around the plaza, all of them are very good and inexpensive and even have a great chiapanecan coffee and crepes, all while listening to great free music. 

By the way, it's very safe to roam around at night, even with young kids like I did.

238168003.name: A fun place to watch people
238168003.author: a TripAdvisor user
238168003.reviewBody: Spend a couple of hours here between 6 and 9 pm to watch mostly locals enjoying the music of the marimba bands.  Many locals are there to dance and it is a lot of fun to watch.  Very safe and the central gazebo is very nicely done.

229403330.name: Fun!
229403330.author: a TripAdvisor user
229403330.reviewBody: This place was teeming with life, enthusiasm, great marimba music! The band was very lively, and young and old were enjoying it. Vendors in the plaza add to the fun and color.

225981285.name: Great Local Feedback
225981285.author: a TripAdvisor user
225981285.reviewBody: This is a great place to go and get a great feeling from local people. Nice and warm people go here to hear marimba music, and dance the evening away! Wear comfy shoes and fresh cotton clothes, and sit there to enjoy the music, or dance along with the rest of them, you will learn from watching them. You will also get to see the way they use their local attires (women just look beautiful). snacks and refreshments are sold here, buy yourself a bottle with water, enjoy the music, and the happiness of the locals.

224298567.name: Wrong photos
224298567.author: a TripAdvisor user
224298567.reviewBody: Please note that the TA photos are NOT of the park!!! They are of a beautiful canyon, well worth visiting. Tuxtla G also has a really great zoo!

207940631.name: Great Tropical Music and Dancing
207940631.author: a TripAdvisor user
207940631.reviewBody: After dinner we walked over to the Marimba Park and witnessed fabulous marimba music and many locals dancing their feet off!!  A great way to enjoy what Tuxtla locals do on a given night. Take it in!

203053816.name: Live Music and Dancing
203053816.author: a TripAdvisor user
203053816.reviewBody: This park is a lovely place to go and enjoy free live marimba music. It\'s a lot of fun to watch the couples dancing, and even join in if that\'s your calling. There are plenty of bars and cafes to enjoy after the music.

198697426.name: Nightly performance
198697426.author: a TripAdvisor user
198697426.reviewBody: I went there Sat and Sun nights and different bands were playing. Very nice music and many people dancing. Great way of spending evening.

190968466.name: Disappointing for a Mexican Plaza
190968466.author: a TripAdvisor user
190968466.reviewBody: We were disappointed in the lack of places to sit and have a coffee or food around the plaza. The plaza was very dirty and lacked the usual atmosphere for Mexican Plazas. If you are in Tuxtla you may as well go but I would not make a special trip for this.

190876700.name: Very good atmosphere
190876700.author: a TripAdvisor user
190876700.reviewBody: Go during the daily live music shows and you\'ll be impressed by the positive vibes coming out of here. If only this could exist in every city.

188679570.name: This place never gets old! A Must Do in Tuxtla
188679570.author: a TripAdvisor user
188679570.reviewBody: I live in Tuxtla and love love love the Marimba Park.  The park brings a lot of life to the center of Tuxtla at night.  They have beautiful live marimba music every night starting at 6 pm.  You can dance or just watch.  You can grab some corn or some tamales and eat while you watch the professional and not so professional dancers shake their thing.  It\'s such a fun place!   \nIf you get bored of the music, you can also visit the Marimba Museum which is on the corner of the park and usually open during the evening.

186826900.name: A real Mexican Family Park
186826900.author: a TripAdvisor user
186826900.reviewBody: Marimba music and dancing every night of the week. Whole families there, safe and enjoyable atmosphere with food and fun.

181420384.name: Great free evening music!
181420384.author: a TripAdvisor user
181420384.reviewBody: Do not miss the enjoyment of this musical evening.\nThe locals come out to hear the musicians...but don\'t expect see many gringos, as we saw none but talked with some locals.

181070456.name: Folklore!
181070456.author: a TripAdvisor user
181070456.reviewBody: This park is so fun with the \'marimba\' playing st night. You can join the locals and tourist to dance at marimba rhythm.

163928026.name: Cool place...
163928026.author: a TripAdvisor user
163928026.reviewBody: Wonderful way to spend an enjoyable evening. I believe they play marimba music live every evening from 6pm -- 9pm. It\'s just a lively and familial atmosphere. You can dance, people watch, eat snacks, drink coffee or find a nearby restaurant or just hangout. You can also buy souveniers there. And I believe they offer a city tour on a tram/trolley vehicle (I did not go on that tour nor do I know what area is covered. But it could be something to look into while you are there).

162329129.name: Dance a Danzon or just watch, enjoy and learn
162329129.author: a TripAdvisor user
162329129.reviewBody: At 8 pm, from Thursday to Sunday, what appears another standard Mexican park, transforms into a dance floor, with live music and even cameras from the local TV station. Most of the dancers are senior local pros, but there is the usual Young couple dancing and getting in love, and lots of spontaneous and amateur dancers, and of course, some tourists with no idea of how to dance a Danzon, but having a great time trying anyway. If you only want to watch, get as early as 6:30 pm in order to seat in the surrounding benches, arranged as for a show with the kiosk in the center of the park. You wouldn\u00b4t believe it at first, but really the place is full by 7:30 with public waithing for the dance to start. So, get early, sit and wait while  enjoying a lovely ice cream or a cobbet corn with mayonaisse and cheese, or chili all around it, as you like it.

157730295.name: Disapointed
157730295.author: a TripAdvisor user
157730295.reviewBody: I like the marimba music and expected a variety of it, but to our surprise there was only one group with one marimba , all kinds of other instruments though, may be we went the wrong day, I don`t know

157374492.name: canyon is beautiful
157374492.author: a TripAdvisor user
157374492.reviewBody: there is 2 ways to view the canyon from above or from inside on a boat tour. the boat tour is awesome you see beautiful views, monkeys, nature, and the tour guide is awesome.

156550862.name: central Tuxtla
156550862.author: a TripAdvisor user
156550862.reviewBody: The center of town, a place where a lot of events are held, both musical and cultural. As the name implies Marimba music and dance are a fixture specially on the week ends. The kiosk is typical of what you would see in many parks in Mexico.
